item.title: Everything Star Wars Canon Has Revealed About Darth Bane, The Sith Who Founded The Rule Of Two
item.description: Darth Bane began a Sith legacy that has since gone on to become one of Star Wars' most influential. Here's everything we know about him in canon.

item.title: It's Even More Clear When The X-Men Will Arrive In The MCU For Real (& It's A Big Deal For Avengers: Secret Wars)
item.description: The future of the X-Men in the Marvel Cinematic Universe has recently become more clear after some illuminating comments from Kevin Feige.

item.title: Where To Watch Red One: Showtimes & Streaming Status
item.description: The Rock and Chris Evans tackle a Christmas movie, and here are the options for where to watch Red One in theaters, on streaming, or on digital.
